mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_sys_portal_function set
FUN_NAME = #{funName},
FUN_CODE = #{funCode},
FUN_URL = #{funUrl},
LINE_TYPE = #{lineType},
VIEW_TYPE = #{viewType},
FUN_COLUMN_SHOW_NAME = #{funColumnShowName},
FUN_COLUMN_NAME = #{funColumnName},
FUN_URLPARAMETER = #{funUrlparameter},
FUN_URLMORE = #{funUrlmore},
FUN_PARAMETERTYPE = #{funParametertype},
FUN_ROWS = #{funRows},
FUN_URL_PARAMETERNAME = #{funUrlParametername},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
